data.description:
PvP: Hitmark/Truesight/Steadyhand/Fastdraw + Accurized + Slideshot/Moving Target/Tunnel Vision/Demo + Timed Payload/MKC/Opening Shot

Judgement can only 2 tap with MKC x 3, but x1 and x2 both improve the usability (2c1b at x1, 1c2b at x2)
PvE: Hitmark/Truesight/Steadyhand/Fastdraw + Tac/Appended Mag + Ensemble/Demo/Slideshot + Timed Payload/MKC

PvE: Barrel Shroud/Corkscrew/Full Choke + Assault/Appended/Tac/Light Mag + Field Prep/Grave Robber/Threat Detector/Surplus + 1-2 Punch/Frenzy

PvP: Full Choke/Barrel Shroud + Accurized/Assault Mag + Slideshot/Surplus/Threat Detector + Snapshot/Elemental Cap

This is an aggressive frame shotgun that can have the highest Handling of any in the game on an Arc subclass with Elemental Capacitor and either Threat Detector or Surplus.
PvE: Barrel Shroud/Corkscrew/Full Choke + Assault/Appended/Tac/Light Mag + Field Prep/Grave Robber/Threat Detector/Surplus + 1-2 Punch/Frenzy
